scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w @holochain-open-dev/file-storage"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: concurrently "RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate workdir/file-storage-test.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a test-app network mdns" "npm run playground"
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
